alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Florence and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woods Bay State Park, or 14 miles west of Lake City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Timmonsville, Pamplico, Quinby, Mars Bluff, Cades, Poston, Cartersville, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Hebron, New Hope, Sardis, Hyman, Hannah, Effingham, Francis Marion University, Friendfield, Claussen and Evergreen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 140 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 148 and 166, and between mile markers 168 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
